    • createMainScene

      private void createMainScene(String pathOfFxmlFile, FunctionInterface functionInterface)
      It creates the scene in FXML file. It doesnt show it unless specified inside functionInterface's code.
      Parameters:
      pathOfFxmlFile - FXML file path of the scene to be created
      functionInterface - the function to be called at the end of scene creation and assignation to stage.

    • askChooseIsland

      public void askChooseIsland(boolean setBan, boolean calculateInfluence)
      Method to handle the client's island choice. If setBan is true, it put the ban on. If calculateInfluence is true, it calculates the influence
      Specified by:
      askChooseIsland in interface ViewInterface
      Parameters:
      setBan - the island ban
      calculateInfluence - the island influence

    • ChooseIslandResponse

      public void ChooseIslandResponse(int selectedIsle, boolean setBan, boolean calculateInfluence)

    • askChooseColour

      public void askChooseColour(int toDiscard, boolean toExclude)
      Method to handle the colour choice. If discard > 0 it discard the colour choice. If toExclude is true it exclude the colour choice when calculating influence
      Specified by:
      askChooseColour in interface ViewInterface
      Parameters:
      toDiscard - value of the colour to discard
      toExclude - if it's true it discard the colour

    • colourResponse

      public void colourResponse(PawnColour Colour, int toDiscard, boolean toExclude)

    • askMoveStudentsFromCard

      public void askMoveStudentsFromCard(int characterId, MovementDestination destination, int studentsToMove, boolean canMoveLess)
      Method to handle the choice of the student on the Character Card
      Specified by:
      askMoveStudentsFromCard in interface ViewInterface
      Parameters:
      characterId - character's cards id
      destination - destination where to move the student to
      studentsToMove - value of the colour of the student to move
      canMoveLess - if it's true the player can decide to move less students, instead than all of them

    • askExchangeStudents

      public void askExchangeStudents(int characterId, int numberOfStudents, MovementDestination from, MovementDestination to)
      Method to handle the exchange of students
      Specified by:
      askExchangeStudents in interface ViewInterface
      Parameters:
      characterId - character's cards id
      numberOfStudents - max number that the player can exchange
      from - starting location of the students to exchange
      to - destination of the students
